text: Józef Pawlusiak (born 16 September 1956) is a Polish skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1980 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Poland Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1980 Winter Olympics Category:People from Bielsko County
title: Józef Pawlusiak
